data.name: Taufik Hidayat
data.introduction: Experienced Software Developer with 2+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications and AI-powered solutions. Specialized in TypeScript, SvelteKit, Golang, and modern web technologies with a proven track record of delivering high-performance systems that achieve 95% accuracy in AI implementations and 20% performance improvements. Currently contributing to cutting-edge projects at Generative Studio, developing financial document analysis systems and multilingual SaaS platforms. Computer Science graduate with extensive experience in both enterprise applications and open-source development, passionate about creating innovative solutions that drive measurable business impact.

responsibilities: Developed an AI-powered financial-document analysis system with SvelteKit, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS. Achieved 95% extraction accuracy and streamlined data-review workflows for finance teams.

Built a dynamic multilingual project-management marketing site using SvelteKit and Tailwind CSS. By integrating a headless WordPress CMS with full i18n support, the page boosted international client engagement by 30%.

Architected a personal and family data-management SaaS platform built with SvelteKit 5, Supabase (PostgreSQL / Auth / Storage), Tailwind CSS, and Stripe. It combines interactive family-tree visualization, secure file vaults, AI-generated avatars, and knowledge-base tooling. Its modular, shadcn-inspired UI cut feature delivery time by ≈ 40%.

Developed a self-serve AI-assistant dashboard that lets businesses deploy phone and chat agents in minutes. Built with SvelteKit 5, Supabase, Stripe, and Tailwind CSS, it features real-time call transcription, voicemail detection, and configurable call flows.

Developed a ticketing application for an ISP in Bekasi using Golang and Fiber framework. Optimized system performance, resulting in 20% faster query processing and improved system scalability to handle 2x previous user load.
Built a backend billing system using Node.js and Adonis.js for the same ISP to manage complex financial transaction.

Created a responsive landing page for a cloud service provider in Jakarta using TypeScript and Astro.js. Achieved 98-100% performance score on Google Lighthouse and reduced page load times to under 2 seconds, improving user engagement.
Engineered a full-featured online manga reading application using SvelteKit and Pocketbase.

Architected an admin panel for anime streaming platform using React Router and Tailwind CSS, featuring automated WordPress data migration to PostgreSQL database and anime metadata synchronization from MyAnimeList API integration.
Developed a dynamic e-commerce platform specifically crafted for reseller businesses.
Orchestrated seamless deployment of team-developed websites across diverse hosting environments.
Curated and maintained the company’s comprehensive product database with meticulous attention to detail.
Crafted compelling content articles for client blogs, enhancing their digital presence.
Revolutionized client website visibility through strategic SEO implementation, dramatically boosting search rankings and user engagement.

achievements: Best Informatics Engineering Student (2024 Faculty of Information Technology Judicium)
Best Academic Achievement in MSIB Batch 5 at seKODlah (Forest Interactive)
Best Capstone Project Winner (Yukitanya) in MSIB Batch 5 at seKODlah (Forest Interactive)
